articles.author: Stella Qiu
articles.description: Asian markets were trying to find a firmer footing on Friday after a rough week, hammered by concerns about China's ailing economy and fears of U.S. rates staying higher for longer as long-term bond yields surged.
articles.title: Asian shares head for 3rd week of losses on China woes, US rates

articles.author: Ben Klayman
articles.description: Vietnamese electric-vehicle maker VinFast, which made a splash this week when its shares debuted on the Nasdaq, has stirred a mix of caution and interest among dealers with a recent change in how it will distribute its cars in the U.S. market.
articles.title: Focus: VinFast's new sales approach has US car dealers cautious but interested

articles.author: Andrew Hayley
articles.description: China's muted economic growth in 2023 as its post-COVID recovery underwhelms has crimped the outlook for demand for diesel fuel, the oil product that is the lifeblood of the economy, paving the way for continuing firm exports.
articles.title: Analysis: China's sputtering economy curbs outlook for diesel demand for rest of 2023

articles.author: Tetsushi Kajimoto
articles.description: Japan's core consumer prices slowed in July, supporting expectations the Bank of Japan (BOJ) will be in no rush to phase out monetary easing, even as inflation remains stubbornly above the central bank's target.
articles.title: Japan's core inflation eases, bolstering view BOJ will stand pat

articles.author: Maytaal Angel, Jessica DiNapoli, Richa Naidu
articles.description: Chocolate makers like Hershey (HSY.N) and Mondelez (MDLZ.O) face tougher trading conditions over the next year as they attempt to pass on soaring cocoa costs to cash-strapped consumers who are cutting back.
articles.title: Analysis: Chocolate makers' prospects sour as cocoa prices spike

articles.author: Sudarshan Varadhan
articles.description: Oil prices looked set to snap a seven-week winning streak on Friday as concerns about demand growth in China as its economy slows, and the possibility of higher for longer U.S. rates triggered losses.
articles.title: Oil set to snap 7-week winning streak on China woes, Fed rate outlook

articles.author: Lewis Jackson, Rishav Chatterjee
articles.description: Australian real estate firm Dexus (DXS.AX) said on Friday it had sold an office building in downtown Sydney, with the buyer receiving a 16% discount on a 2022 valuation as higher interest rates and home working crunch prices for office space.
articles.title: Sydney office block sold at 16% discount as rates, remote working hit sector

articles.author: Clare Jim, Jonathan Stempel, Dietrich Knauth
articles.description: Embattled developer China Evergrande Group (3333.HK) has filed for protection from creditors in a U.S. bankruptcy court as part of its debt restructuring process, as anxiety grows over China's worsening property crisis and a weakening economy.
articles.title: China Evergrande files for protection in US court as part of $32 bln debt overhaul

articles.author: Jacqueline Thomsen
articles.description: Lawyers for Donald Trump on Thursday asked a federal judge in Washington to schedule an April 2026 trial for the former president, on federal charges that he allegedly sought to overturn his 2020 election loss to Democrat Joe Biden.
articles.title: Trump's lawyers propose 2026 trial date in federal election case

articles.author: Deena Beasley
articles.description: U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said on Thursday that it was tracking a new, highly mutated lineage of the virus that causes COVID-19.
articles.title: US CDC tracks new lineage of virus that causes COVID
